sqlMap.select: /* group.totalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) PARENT_ID=CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER) SHORT_PATH LIKE '%'||#shortPathCond#||'%' PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#principalNameCond#||'%'
/* group.exist */ SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' AND SHORT_PATH=#shortPath#

/* group.findByPage */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortMethod$ ORDER BY PRINCIPAL_ID ASC ) as rnum FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) PARENT_ID=CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER) SHORT_PATH LIKE '%'||#shortPathCond#||'%' PRINCIPAL_NAME LIKE '%'||#principalNameCond#||'%' ) tb1 WHERE tb1.rnum BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#
/* group.findAll */ SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G'
/* group.findByCondition */ SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID, SHORT_PATH, PRINCIPAL_NAME FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' AND SHORT_PATH IN ($groups$)
/* group.findByMaster */ SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' =CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER)

/* group.detail */
SELECT a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.PARENT_ID,a.SHORT_PATH,a.PRINCIPAL_NAME,a.THEME,a.SITE_NAME,a.DEFAULT_PAGE,a.SUB_PAGE,a.PRINCIPAL_TYPE,a.PRINCIPAL_ORDER,a.CREATION_DATE,a.MODIFIED_DATE,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO01,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO02,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO03,a.PRINCIPAL_DESC,b.DOMAIN_CODE "DOMAIN" ,a.DOMAIN_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOMAIN b ON a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER)
/* group.validateInsertable */ SELECT COUNT(PARENT_ID) FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID = CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.insert:
/* group.insert */
INSERT INTO SECURITY_PRINCIPAL ( PRINCIPAL_ID, DOMAIN_ID ,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,FULL_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,CLASSNAME,IS_MAPPING_ONLY,IS_ENABLED,THEME,SITE_NAME,DEFAULT_PAGE,SUB_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC ) VALUES ( CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER), CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) ,CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER),#shortPath#,'/group/'||#shortPath#,#principalName#,'com.saltware.enview.security.InternalGroupPrincipalImpl',0,1,#theme#,#siteName#,#defaultPage#,#subPage#,'G',(SELECT count(PRINCIPAL_ID) FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PARENT_ID=CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER)),#creationDate#,#modifiedDate#,#principalInfo01#,#principalInfo02#,#principalInfo03#,#principalDesc# )
sqlMap.update:
/* group.update */
UPDATE SECURITY_PRINCIPAL SET PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER),PARENT_ID=CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER),SHORT_PATH=#shortPath#,PRINCIPAL_NAME=#principalName#,THEME=#theme#,SITE_NAME=#siteName#,DEFAULT_PAGE=#defaultPage#,SUB_PAGE=#subPage#,PRINCIPAL_ORDER=#principalOrder#,MODIFIED_DATE=#modifiedDate#,PRINCIPAL_INFO01=#principalInfo01#,PRINCIPAL_INFO02=#principalInfo02#,PRINCIPAL_INFO03=#principalInfo03#,PRINCIPAL_DESC=#principalDesc# WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.select: /* group.validateDeletable */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DOMAIN WHERE DOMAIN_ID IN ( SELECT DOMAIN_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'G' AND PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER) AND PARENT_ID = ( SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'G' AND PARENT_ID IS NULL ) )
sqlMap.delete: /* group.delete */ DELETE FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER)

/* group.deleteChildren */
DELETE FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE 1=1 AND PARENT_ID=CAST(#parentId# AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.select: /* group.detailParent */ SELECT a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,a.PRINCIPAL_NAME,a.THEME,a.SITE_NAME,a.DEFAULT_PAGE,a.SUB_PAGE,a.PRINCIPAL_TYPE,a.PRINCIPAL_ORDER,a.CREATION_DATE,a.MODIFIED_DATE,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO01,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO02,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO03,a.PRINCIPAL_DESC,b.DOMAIN,b.DOMAIN_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOMAIN b ON a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PRINCIPAL_ID=(SELECT PARENT_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER))

/* group.findChildren */ SELECT PRINCIPAL_ID,PARENT_ID,SHORT_PATH,PRINCIPAL_NAME,THEME,SITE_NAME,DEFAULT_PAGE,SUB_PAGE,PRINCIPAL_TYPE,PRINCIPAL_ORDER,CREATION_DATE,MODIFIED_DATE,PRINCIPAL_INFO01,PRINCIPAL_INFO02,PRINCIPAL_INFO03,PRINCIPAL_DESC FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PARENT_ID=CAST( #id# AS INTEGER) AND PRINCIPAL_TYPE='G' DOMAIN_ID=CAST(#domainId# AS INTEGER) ORDER BY PRINCIPAL_ORDER ASC

/* group.findSibling */ SELECT a.PRINCIPAL_ID,a.PARENT_ID,a.SHORT_PATH,a.PRINCIPAL_NAME,a.THEME,a.SITE_NAME,a.DEFAULT_PAGE,a.SUB_PAGE,a.PRINCIPAL_TYPE,a.PRINCIPAL_ORDER,a.CREATION_DATE,a.MODIFIED_DATE,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO01,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO02,a.PRINCIPAL_INFO03,a.PRINCIPAL_DESC,b.DOMAIN,b.DOMAIN_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL a LEFT OUTER JOIN DOMAIN b ON a.DOMAIN_ID = b.DOMAIN_ID WHERE a.PARENT_ID=(SELECT PARENT_ID FROM SECURITY_PRINCIPAL WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#id# AS INTEGER)) ORDER BY PRINCIPAL_ORDER ASC

UPDATE SECURITY_PRINCIPAL SET PRINCIPAL_ORDER=#principalOrder# WHERE PRINCIPAL_ID=CAST(#principalId# AS INTEGER)
